ticket.title: ActiveSupport - Incorrect Inflectors for "nurseries"
ticket.original-body:
I'm using rails 3.0.3 and as per the longstanding policy of not taking further inflector patches, I'm using the following initializer:
@@@ ruby ActiveSupport::Inflector.inflections do |inflect| inflect.irregular 'nursery', 'nurseries' end @@@
Plurals are working fine @@@ ruby >> "nursery".pluralize => "nurseries" @@@
however singular isn't working properly:
@@@ ruby >> "nurseries".singularize => "nurseries" @@@
ticket.latest-body:
I'm using rails 3.0.3 and as per the longstanding policy of not taking further inflector patches, I'm using the following initializer:
@@@ ruby ActiveSupport::Inflector.inflections do |inflect| inflect.irregular 'nursery', 'nurseries' end @@@
Plurals are working fine @@@ ruby >> "nursery".pluralize => "nurseries" @@@
however singular isn't working properly:
@@@ ruby >> "nurseries".singularize => "nurseries" @@@
ticket.original-body-html:
I'm using rails 3.0.3 and as per the longstanding policy of not taking further inflector patches, I'm using the following initializer:

ActiveSupport::Inflector.inflections do |inflect|
 inflect.irregular 'nursery', 'nurseries'
end

Plurals are working fine

>> "nursery".pluralize
=> "nurseries"

however singular isn't working properly:

>> "nurseries".singularize
=> "nurseries"

version.body:
I'm using rails 3.0.3 and as per the longstanding policy of not taking further inflector patches, I'm using the following initializer:
@@@ ruby ActiveSupport::Inflector.inflections do |inflect| inflect.irregular 'nursery', 'nurseries' end @@@
Plurals are working fine @@@ ruby >> "nursery".pluralize => "nurseries" @@@
however singular isn't working properly:
@@@ ruby >> "nurseries".singularize => "nurseries" @@@
version.body-html:
I'm using rails 3.0.3 and as per the longstanding policy of not taking further inflector patches, I'm using the following initializer:

ActiveSupport::Inflector.inflections do |inflect|
 inflect.irregular 'nursery', 'nurseries'
end

Plurals are working fine

>> "nursery".pluralize
=> "nurseries"

however singular isn't working properly:

>> "nurseries".singularize
=> "nurseries"
version.title: ActiveSupport - Incorrect Inflectors for "nurseries"

version.body:
@@@ ruby
ActiveSupport::Inflector.inflections do |inflect| inflect.clear :uncountables inflect.irregular 'nursery', 'nurseries' end
@@@
As the above works, I assume the problem is "series" in line 54 in rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/inflections.rb
@@@ ruby inflect.uncountable(%w(equipment information rice money species series fish sheep jeans)) @@@
version.body-html:
ActiveSupport::Inflector.inflections do |inflect|
  inflect.clear :uncountables
  inflect.irregular 'nursery', 'nurseries'
end

As the above works, I assume the problem is "series" in line 54 in rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/inflections.rb

inflect.uncountable(%w(equipment information rice money species series fish sheep jeans))
version.title: ActiveSupport - Incorrect Inflectors for "nurseries"

version.body: There is a patch available in #6093
version.body-html: There is a patch available in #6093
version.title: ActiveSupport - Incorrect Inflectors for "nurseries"

version.body: I know that this was first, but the other ticket has a patch, so it will be easier to discuss there. Closing as duplicate.
version.body-html: I know that this was first, but the other ticket has a patch, so it will be easier to discuss there. Closing as duplicate.
